snippet: The food retailer, based in Minnesota, said that it had been able to prevent the breach from affecting all its locations.
abstract: Minnesota-based food retailer Supervalu says its cash register system had been accessed by hackers, possibly resulting in theft of credit and debit card information from its supermarket and liquor store customers, as well as other stores sold in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The food retailer, based in Minnesota, said that it had been able to prevent the breach from affecting all its locations.

headline.print_headline: Food Retailer Discloses a Data Breach
